listing.title: MacBook Pro 2020 - Perfect for CS Students
listing.description:
**Perfect MacBook Pro for UWaterloo Students!**

This 2020 MacBook Pro is in excellent condition and ready to handle all your CS assignments, data science projects, and daily computing needs. The sleek space gray finish looks professional in lectures and study sessions.

**Key Features:**
- 13-inch Retina display for crisp coding sessions
- Intel Core i5 processor (handles compiling with ease)
- 8GB RAM - perfect for running multiple IDEs and browsers
- 256GB SSD storage
- Touch Bar for quick shortcuts
- All-day battery life for marathon study sessions

**Condition:** Gently used, minor cosmetic wear on bottom case. Screen is pristine with no scratches. Battery health at 87%. Original charger included.

Meet on campus for safe exchange. Cash or e-transfer accepted.
